name: SlashDash
summary:
WHAT IS SLASHDASH?

SlashDash is a competitive local multiplayer showdown launching exclusively on Xbox One this summer. Compete for glory against your foes or team up with a friend in Capture the Flag. Perfect for parties and tournaments, players shoot, teleport, slash, and of course dash to victory.
Created for two to four players, SlashDash  has nine thoughtfully designed levels and four unique game modes to make for non stop competitive action. The art and music, inspired by instruments and locations of Edo-period Japan, evolve as you play, enhancing the full ninja experience.
info:
• 中文名: 忍者派对
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1-4人
  • 发行日期: 2015年7月17日
  • 售价: $9.99
  • 官方网站: http://www.nevernautgames.com/games/#slashdash-1
